en.tagline: Don't just check the news. Understand it.
en.description: India's most advanced AI-powered misinformation detection system. Verify content from any source, detect deepfakes, and learn media literacy.
en.paste_url_label: Paste URL or Enter Text to Verify
en.paste_url_placeholder: Paste a social media URL, news article link, or type content to verify...
en.upload_description: Drop files here or click to browse
en.upload_formats: Supports JPG, PNG, MP4, WebM up to 50MB
en.practice_identifying: Practice identifying misinformation with our interactive quizzes
en.spot_fake_headline: Can you spot the fake headline?
en.realtime_insights: Real-time insights into misinformation trends across India
en.verification_partners: Our verification system is powered by leading fact-checking organizations and AI research institutions
en.multi_source_desc: Cross-reference claims across trusted news sources and fact-checking databases
en.ai_analysis_desc: Advanced language models analyze tone, source credibility, and factual accuracy
en.transparency_desc: Clear attribution of sources and evidence for every verification decision
en.install_description: Get offline access and faster verification
